fullText: Matthew Broderick and Annaleigh Ashford make an appealing team in this revival of A.R. Gurney's 1995 comedy about a married couple whose relationship is tested when the husband brings home a stray dog.
dtliExcerpt: Matthew Broderick and Annaleigh Ashford make an appealing team in this revival of A.R. Gurney's 1995 comedy about a married couple whose relationship is tested when the husband brings home a stray dog.
